input.sentences: this is a beautiful old house .
can you believe it was made in 1672 ?
it has only been refinished once !
and still has all of the same furniture !
this is my sister | she 's awesome .
output.sentences: We had visited the mansion in our youth.
We got closer and saw it was still occupied.
Would someone allow us a little peek?
Once inside, I saw the original bar used to serve us lemonade on that day long ago.
We were told an invitation would always be open.
